content.description: Start inside a cave/slot made by two boulders pressed against each other.  Start as far back as you can.  Climb the steep slopers and pinches up/out on a leftward-trending direction.  2 finishes can be done.  They are about the same in difficulty.
content.protection: Pads and a spot is worth it.
content.location:
This can be found at The Office. It's East-facing (opposite) and about 20/30 feet right of

The Business

.  Walk off the back.

content.description: Start low in a nice shelf on the far right side of The Office Wall. Climb up and right past a section of long moves on small crimps.  Then gear up for a big lock off to a really nice crimp below a good jug.  Finish with care. A fall at the top will result in injury.  Enjoy!!! Downclimb off to the right.
content.protection: Many pads and two spotters would be best.  A big monster pad was very nice.
content.location: This line is found on the rightmost side of The Office, which is on top of a rock formation south of The Pass and the Sisters formation.
